project_plan.name: Word Frequency Counter in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that reads a text file, counts the frequency of each word, and displays the top 10 most common words in the terminal.

task.name: Implement the file reading functionality to read a text file.
Implement the word counting logic to count the frequency of each word.
Determine the top 10 most common words from the counted frequencies.
Implement the display logic to print the top 10 most common words to the terminal.
Write tests for each of the functionalities above.
Execute tests on all implemented functionalities to ensure that they function correctly.
